judge_outputs.raw: {"aspect_votes": {"inquiry_quality": "B", "persona_adaptation": "B", "methodology_critique": "B", "plan_completeness": "B", "literature_quality": "B", "actionability_risks": "B", "guideline_adherence": "B"}, "winner": "B", "justification": "System B is better because it provides a more structured and actionable plan for a beginner. It clearly outlines three distinct options with \"what,\" \"why,\" and \"how\" for each, making it easier for a novice to choose a starting point. System B also does a better job of anticipating potential pitfalls and offering concrete advice on how to avoid them. While System A offers a good plan, it is less beginner-friendly in its presentation and structure."}

parsed.justification: System B is better because it provides a more structured and actionable plan for a beginner. It clearly outlines three distinct options with "what," "why," and "how" for each, making it easier for a novice to choose a starting point. System B also does a better job of anticipating potential pitfalls and offering concrete advice on how to avoid them. While System A offers a good plan, it is less beginner-friendly in its presentation and structure.
